document_data.name: Bay of Balefires
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bay of Balefires''' was a small inlet found within the [[Lake of Steam]] of [[south Faerûn]].<ref name=EotSS-p167">{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M">
document_data.Geography: The bay sat along the southwestern corner of the Lake of Steam near [[Talagath's Gauntlet]].<ref name=EotSS-p167"/><ref name=EotSS.M"/>
document_data.Description: The bay was relatively shallow and muddy. Large plumes of smoke rose from the sulphorous waters several times a year courtesy of underwater volcanic activity, giving the bay its name.<ref name=EotSS-p163">
document_data.Notable Locations: The only notable location along the Bay of Balefires was the town of [[Tulmon]].<ref name=EotSS-p167"/><ref name=EotSS.M"/>
